name: The Craftsman
message: You care deeply about doing things right. You'll push back on shortcuts and build things that last. Watch out for perfectionism slowing you down.

name: The Firefighter
message: You thrive in chaos and can ship under pressure. Startups love you early on, but make sure you don't burn out or leave a trail of tech debt.

name: The Team Player
message: You keep the team aligned and avoid conflict. You're great at consensus-building, but sometimes you need to push harder for what you believe.

name: The Architect
message: You think in systems and see around corners. You're invaluable for scaling, but may frustrate founders who want speed over structure.

name: The Pragmatist
message: You balance idealism with reality. You know when to compromise. Just make sure you're not always the one giving ground.

name: The Challenger
message: You speak up and push boundaries. You make teams better through debate, but watch your toneâ€”not everyone sees conflict as productive.
